column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Perth .
#Text=And then we stayed in Perth the extra few days .
#Text=Sydney .
#Text=Two Australia wins for the first time against Canada .
#Text=In the team 's 52 – 50 win against Canada
#Text=you scored a lay up with sixteen seconds left in the match .
#Text=I did !
#Text=That was pretty memorable actually , ‘ cause Canada had a press on , and what I did was , I went forward and then went back , and they did n't notice me sitting behind .
#Text=Except Leisl did in my team , who was inbounding the ball , and Leisl hurled a big pass to almost half way to me , which I ran on to and had an open lay up .

#Text=And the Canadians , you could just see the look on their faces as Leisl hurled this big pass , thinking " but we thought we had them all trapped " , and then they 've looked and seen that I 'm already over half way waiting for this pass on an open lay up .
#Text=Scariest lay up I 've ever taken , mind you , because when you know there 's no one on you , and this is the lay up that could win the game , it 's like : " Do n't miss this !

#Text=Do n't miss this !

column1: #Text=Ping !
#Text=That brings us to the 2000 Paralympics .
#Text=It says you missed the practice game beforehand because of illness , and half the team had some respiratory infection prior to the game .
#Text=Yeah .
#Text=You scored twelve points against the Netherlands , the most that you 've ever scored in an international match .
#Text=Quite likely , yeah .
#Text=At one point you made four baskets in a row .
#Text=I did !
#Text=The team beat Japan , and went into the gold medal game .
#Text=You missed the previous days ' training session due to an elbow injury ?
#Text=No , I got the elbow injury during the gold medal game .
#Text=During the match , you were knocked onto your right side , and ...
#Text=The arm got trapped underneath the wheelchair .
#Text=Someone just bumped you ?
#Text=Tracey Fergusson from Canada .
#Text=You were knocked down and you tore the tendons in your elbow , which required an elbow reconstruction ...
#Text=Yes .
#Text=And multiple surgeries after that .
#Text=You spent eleven weeks on a CPM machine – what 's a CPM machine ?
#Text=It 's a continuous passive movement machine .
#Text=You know what they use for the footballers after they 've had a knee reconstruction ?
#Text=It 's a machine that moves their knee up and down so it does n't stiffen .
#Text=And they start with just a little bit of movement following the surgery and they 're supposed to get up to about 90 degrees before they go home .
#Text=There was only one or two elbow machines in the country , so they flew one in from Queensland for me to use , to try and get my arm moving .
